Content: Can be used to detect valuable objects and info around.
Can be used to accelerate movement and overcome difficult terrain.
Can be used to levitate objects to deal with different situations.
Allows Resonators to sprint onto the walls and rocks
Can be used to glide in the air to reach higher destinations.
Can be used to display absorbed Echoes.
Can be used to mark down Resonating Sounds.
Can be used to take pictures of memorable times.
